name: One & Zero
description:
One & Zero is a digital marketing agency based in New York. We build websites that meet our clients’ unique needs. Fluent in all things digital, our team shares the belief that all actions related to the build and marketing should be rooted in data and research. We can provide you with a full range of digital marketing services, from Strategic Mapping to Custom Web Development and Social Amplification.
WE’RE A DIFFERENT KIND OF DIGITAL AGENCY
We’re a small but incredibly agile crew of programmers, UX experts, creatives, and Internet marketing specialists in New York City. We believe that in today’s marketing environment, a business’s most important asset is its website. The reason we jump out of bed every morning is so we can get to work solving online marketing challenges for our clients. What other digital agency could say that? We’re happiest when we’re writing code, analyzing web traffic, and creating successful digital sales funnels.
All too often, website design companies approach design and SEO separately. But at One & Zero, we believe that rankings are a direct reflection of the website’s build. It is important to establish your presence across all relevant search engine platforms, and to build your site around a broad range of relevant keyword concepts.
Conventional online advertising is short-lived. Sure, you may experience temporary results with it, but your online visibility will evaporate the moment you stop paying. Our methodology is based on proven, organic Internet strategies and best practices. If you choose to work with us, your investment will create long term results and profits for your company.
Optimize your presence across the web on the platforms that matter to your customers.
